comingle.android.directory.ui.dialogsequences

Class LanSetupDialogSequence<D extends java.io.Serializable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • comingle.android.directory.ui.dialogsequences.AlertDialogSequence<D>
        • comingle.android.directory.ui.dialogsequences.LanSetupDialogSequence<D>
  • Type Parameters:
    D - Type of administrative data handled by the directory.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class LanSetupDialogSequence<D extends java.io.Serializable>
extends AlertDialogSequence<D>
    An instance of the AlertDialogSequence, that prompts for user to setup a LANDirectory.
    Author:
    Edmund S.L. Lam

      • LanSetupDialogSequence

        public LanSetupDialogSequence(android.app.Activity activity,
                      comingle.comms.directory.BaseDirectory<D> directory,
                      int row_res_id,
                      int name_res_id,
                      int loc_res_id,
                      int ip_addr_res_id)
        Standard constructor, that prompts for request codes and displays current directory nodes when setup is completed.
        Parameters:
        activity - activity that embeds the dialog boxes.
        directory - the directory to setup.
        row_res_id - Resource ID of row view for each node entry.
        name_res_id - Resource ID of name field for a node.
        loc_res_id - Resource ID of location field for a node.
        ip_addr_res_id - Resource ID of address field for a node.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Run LAN setup dialog sequence. Run customized sequence (see runSeqWithGeneratedReqCode) if request code prompt is omitted.
